## Getting Help

### Documentation

- [README](../README.md) - Project overview

- [FAQ](FAQ.md) - Frequently asked questions

### Community

- [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/jamiya/jamiya-app/discussions) - Ask questions and share ideas

### Contact

- **Email**: support@jamiya.dz
- **Website**: https://jamiya.dz

## Reporting Issues

### Bug Reports

Please use our [Bug Report Template](https://github.com/jamiya/jamiya-app/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml)

### Feature Requests

Please use our [Feature Request Template](https://github.com/jamiya/jamiya-app/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml)

## Contributing

Want to contribute? Check out our [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
